tacos.name: Tacos al Pastor
tacos.description: Tender marinated pork, grilled pineapple, fresh cilantro, and finely chopped onion, served on a warm corn tortilla.

tacos.name: Tacos de Asada
tacos.description: Juicy, grilled steak, complemented by cilantro, onion, and tangy salsa, wrapped in a warm corn tortilla.

tacos.name: Tacos de Pollo
tacos.description: Succulent, marinated chicken, topped with fresh cilantro, onion, and a dash of zesty salsa, served on a corn tortilla.

tacos.name: Tacos de Pescado
tacos.description: Fresh, flaky fish, lightly battered and fried, topped with a zesty slaw and a drizzle of creamy sauce, served on a corn tortilla.

sides.name: Chips and Salsa
sides.description: Crispy tortilla chips, served with our homemade, zesty tomato salsa.

sides.name: Guacamole
sides.description: Creamy, freshly-made guacamole, perfect for dipping tortilla chips or topping your tacos.

sides.name: Pico de Gallo
sides.description: A refreshing mix of chopped tomatoes, onion, cilantro, and jalape√±o, lightly seasoned with lime juice and salt.

sides.name: Arroz Mexicano
sides.description: Flavorful Mexican-style rice, cooked with a blend of tomatoes, onion, garlic, and spices.

drinks.name: Margaritas
drinks.description: Handcrafted margaritas, made with premium tequila and fresh-squeezed lime juice.

drinks.name: Aguas Frescas
drinks.description: Refreshing, house-made drinks, available in a variety of flavors such as horchata, tamarindo, and jamaica.

drinks.name: Mexican Beer
drinks.description: A selection of popular Mexican beers, served ice-cold.

drinks.name: Bottled Sodas
drinks.description: An assortment of sodas, including both popular international brands and Mexican favorites.
